posts.post_content:

If shipping to you is more involved, let's work all that out BEFORE you decide to buy.

Acceptable forms of payment:
- PayPal G&S
- PayPal F&F
- US Postal Money Order

First "I'll take it" in this thread trumps all other communication.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I’ll take it.
